lead_paragraph: Marc Tessier-Lavigne, who will leave Rockefeller University to lead Stanford University, has also worked as an executive in the biotech industry,

headline.print_headline: New Stanford President Has Biotech Connection
headline.main: New Stanford President Has Biotech Connection

snippet: Marc Tessier-Lavigne, who will leave Rockefeller University to lead Stanford University, has also worked as an executive in the biotech industry,
abstract: Interview with incoming Stanford University president Marc Tessier-Lavigne reveals that his position on board of biotech company Juno Therapeutics will be reviewed to make sure no conflicts of interest exist.
